Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Natalie Murray
Review: The best food I've had in a long time. Owner and family are very friendly and attentive. You HAVE to eat here if you're in Sabang. As you can see from our plates essentially liked clean, the food was amazing. Vegetarian options: Vegan and veg options Kid-friendliness: Family establishment Service: Dine in Meal type: Dinner Price per person: ?400–600 Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5 Recommended dishes: Chicken Curry, Aloo Gobi Masala

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Travis M.
Review: Great food but all things considered it's overpriced. Took a long time to receive our food. Very small portions. No AC or breeze. Food is very good though... Food: 4 Service: 3 Atmosphere: 1

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Oli Barrett
Review: Pricey for the area but you get what you pay for, excellent food. Only issue is it was too small

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Agnes Granberg
Review: The place was before located at the beach and are now just a quick walk from the beach. Amazing food and the people who run the place are so nice!! You need to come here if you are in the area!!! You can’t go here and miss eating at the restaurant! Vegetarian options: We chose the vegetarian tom yum soup and the pad thai. It was the best pad thai we had eaten! Service: Dine in Meal type: Dinner Price per person: ?400–600

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Emma Ahlbäck
Review: A really good place to eat. They have a lot of options. Food is affordable and the quality is incredible. The chef runs the restaurant on his own and is super kind! I would definitely go back. It is so close to the place we are staying, Cafe Sabang Guest House. Service: Dine in Meal type: Dinner Price per person: ?400–600 Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Frank Beja

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: mitchell m
Review: Food is fantastic! Fresh vegetables either Thai or India style. Her place on the beach was destroyed but the new place is still a work in progress. Definitely a great place to eat. Many items on the menu. Parking: Park on the quiet street. Easy. Service: Dine in Meal type: Dinner Price per person: ?200–400 Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 4

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Iris Poria

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Carlo Reyes
Review: The food is very delicious Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Pat Apon
Review: Nice and good place and food! Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Tayla Whitehorn
Review: Most comfortable welcoming restaurant! Adonis is such a talented chef! He puts so much love into the menu and treated me like family! We got to chat for a long time which was so nice, I can’t thank Adonis and the family enough for their time and kindness, and delicious food

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Gina Villalobos
Review: For a delicious Asian food visit Asiano gourmet cuisine Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Camille Credo

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Review: Foods are great. They are accepting deliveries and more. Can also be a place for some occasion. Accomodqting location for family and travellers. Service: Delivery Meal type: Lunch Price per person: ?1,400–1,600

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Tessa Taylor
Review: Vegetarian options: Tofu! Service: Dine in Meal type: Lunch Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 4

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Roqueta Gabiana

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Master LM Navarro
Review: Good food and service. Recommended and highly suggested for dates and impromptu meet ups Service: Dine in Meal type: Lunch Price per person: ?600–800 Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 5 Recommended dishes: Chicken Curry, Grilled Lapu Lapu, Moroccan Vegetable Stew

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Myca De Silva

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: Hana Wilson
Review: The chef runs the kitchen and service all himself. He's super friendly, the food is affordable and the quality is incredible. Great vegetarian options and while I'm not usually a banana shake fan, this one I adored. If you're in Sabang, highly recommend you pay this place a visit. Service: Dine in Meal type: Lunch Food: 5 Service: 5 Atmosphere: 4 Recommended dishes: Aloo Gobi Masala

Restaurant Name: Asiano gourmet cuisine, Seafood & Vegetarian restaurant
Author: clemente jr aguinaldo
Review: Lovely food and owner! We will be back for sure. Best, Anja and Lennart
